item.title: Michael add a quote by William Golding
item.description: "We've got to have rules and obey them. After all, we're not savages. We're English, and the English are best at everything." -- William Golding

item.title: Michael add a quote by William Golding
item.description: "Fancy thinking the Beast was something you could hunt and kill! You knew, didn’t you? I’m part of you? Close, close, close! I’m the reason why it’s no go? Why things are what they are?" -- William Golding

item.title: Michael add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "The compelling thing about making art&#8212;or making anything, I suppose&#8212;is the moment when the vaporous, insubstantial idea becomes a solid <em>there</em>, a thing, a substance in a world of substances. Circe, Nimbue, Artemis, Athena, all the old sorceresses: they must have known the feeling as they transformed mere men into fabulous creatures, stole the secrets of the magicians, disposed armies: ah, look, there it is, the new thing. Call it a swine, a war, a laurel tree. Call it art." -- Audrey Niffenegger
